main event: A resident of San Augustine, Texas reported seeing a bright silver, round object move overhead and then speed off over the horizon.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright silver, round object.
It moved directly overhead and then picked up speed, moving out of sight over the horizon.
The witness stated that their television 'went crazy' when the object passed overhead.
The report was called in to the 2nd Bombardment Wing Command Post, and the investigating officer noted that San Augustine is located about 80 miles from Barksdale Air Force Base.
The Air Force requested the witness to complete an additional questionnaire for further evaluation, indicating they did not have sufficient information to properly assess the sighting.
witnesses: a resident of San Augustine, Texas
